fields.name: seller_address
fields.description: Address or contact details of the seller.

fields.name: buyer_address
fields.description: Address or contact details of the buyer.

fields.name: line_items
fields.description: List of line items (products or services). Each item may include description, quantity, unit_price, tax, line_total.

fields.name: subtotal
fields.description: Subtotal amount before tax and discounts.

fields.name: tax_amount
fields.description: Total tax amount on the invoice.

fields.name: total_amount
fields.description: Grand total amount to be paid.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: Currency code for monetary amounts (e.g., USD, EUR).

fields.name: payment_terms
fields.description: Payment terms such as Net 30, immediate, partial payments, etc.

fields.name: payment_instructions
fields.description: Bank details, payment links, or instructions for how to pay.
